bug.short_desc: Rhythmbox crashes when opening iOS device with a PlayCounts.xml file.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1184007 Patch to fix crash
Description of problem: libgpod has a bug where it uses glib2 badly causing software that uses it to crash. The crash happens when parsing the PlayCounts.xml file on iOS devices. Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): libgpod-0.8.3-11
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open Rhythmbox 2. Click the Apple device 3. Crash
Actual results: Crash
Expected results: No Crash
Additional info: There is an upstream patch for this: https://sourceforge.net/p/gtkpod/libgpod/ci/8dc5015ae036b219c4c9579a156886aa3a722aa5/tree/src/itdb_itunesdb.c?diff=8b85cadf2d9e9d26ce6e52336177beb8d1472458
Upstream is quite dead though. Would be great if this could get applied to the current package.
